about_the_game:
A husband and wife crew scour the ocean for a living. They come across a seemingly abandoned rig in the middle of the Pacific Ocean. This facility holds secrets that Cayne Corporation would rather keep hidden.



BONE TOTEM is a gruesome narrative with a new cast featuring the same point-and-click adventure gameplay as 2015's STASIS. Combine items, Interact with systems and solve incredible puzzles while experiencing a compelling and personal story.



Mac, Charlie, and their daughter's Super-Toy, Moses, will scrape the depths of resilience and descend into a sci-fi horror story of unleashed sci-fi terror.



  • Beautifully rendered isometric backgrounds
  • Switch between three unique characters, each with their own skills.
  • Use an innovative shared inventory system
  • Puzzles and story-based gameplay
  • Voiced characters
  • Explore a world full of rich deep history and lore that builds on the STASIS universe.
  • Full motion rendered video cut scenes
  • Ultrawide screen support
  • Native Gamepad
  • 16:9 / 16:10 4k support

content_descriptors.notes:
Depictions of blood
Graphic and realistic-looking depictions of physical conflict.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+ 64-bit or newer (Windows 10 recommended)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 @ 2.50 GHz / AMD Phenom II X3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX11 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any DirectX Compatible Sound Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400 @ 3.10 GHz / AMD Phenom II X6 1100T
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX11 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any DirectX Compatible Sound Card
